MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA8 postcode area of Ayr. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2.07pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because additional network checks are now required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:58pm on Wednesday, 13 January 2021
